events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your experience and resume keywords.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening call went well, and the recruiter is impressed with your skills and background.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You completed the technical interview successfully, answering all questions thoughtfully and demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th to discuss culture fit and benefits in more detail.
Your HR interview went very well and they appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values.
We have formally extended a job offer for the Software Engineer role, including salary and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback on the offer, expressing enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The offer has been accepted, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as our new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started with access to all necessary tools and introductory sessions scheduled.
The recruitment process is now complete, and we have successfully onboarded our new Software Engineer.
